title: Christmas 2024: Santa in Uniform | Gordon Life | northwestgeorgianews.com
text:
Christmas 2024: Santa in Uniform
- By Hannah Dougherty HDougherty@CalhounTimes.com
[Comments](/calhoun_times/gordon_life/local/christmas-2024-santa-in-uniform/collection_e53ed7b2-c21b-11ef-8948-338c4bedfb9b.html#comments)
Gordon County Fire and Rescue organized this year's Santa in Uniform program, giving select County Schools students a chance to visit and take pictures with Santa Claus followed by a Walmart shopping spree. Breakfast was provided to students at Fire Station No. 1, followed by an escort provided by Fire and Rescue, Calhoun Fire Department, the Sheriff's Office, Calhoun Police Department, Georgia State Patrol, AdventHealth Gordon EMS, and Gordon County EMA to Home Depot for Santa photos. From there, the ride continued to Walmart, where the students were given money to spend on gifts they wanted this Christmas, alongside the personnel that made the event possible.
As featured on
